scripts.aws-deploy:create: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name ChatServerStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --template-body file://$(pwd)/cloudformation-template.yml --parameters ParameterKey=AmiId,ParameterValue=$AMI_ID ParameterKey=InstanceType,ParameterValue=$INSTANCE_TYPE ParameterKey=ChatGitRepoUrl,ParameterValue=$GIT_REPO_URL
scripts.aws-deploy:update: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name ChatServerStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --template-body file://$(pwd)/cloudformation-template.yml --parameters ParameterKey=AmiId,ParameterValue=$AMI_ID ParameterKey=InstanceType,ParameterValue=$INSTANCE_TYPE ParameterKey=ChatGitRepoUrl,ParameterValue=$GIT_REPO_URL
